components.description: A dart board with dart hitting the center / bullseye region.
components.title: Direct Hit

description: A dart board with dart hitting the center / bullseye region.
title: Direct Hit

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Game symbol
emoji_net_data.definition: AÂ dart board with dart hitting the center / bullseye region. Direct Hit was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 i http://emojipedia.org/direct-hit/
emoji_net_data.name: direct hit

bn:00096292a: Habitually careful to agree with a standard, a rule, or a promise; accurate; methodical; punctual.
Conforming exactly or almost exactly to fact or to a standard or performing with total accuracy

bn:00082489v: Intend (something) to move towards a certain goal

bn:00082491v: To yearn (for) or have a powerful or ambitious plan, desire, or hope (to do or be something).
Have an ambitious plan or a lofty goal

bn:00082485v: Point or cause to go (blows, weapons, or objects such as photographic equipment) towards
To point or cause to go (blows, weapons, or objects such as photographic equipment) towards

bn:00091708v: To perform in (a sport); to participate in (a game).
To take part in a sport's match.

bn:00037180n: An activity described by a set of rules, especially for the purpose of entertainment, often competitive or having an explicit goal.

A class of computer program in which one or more users interact with the computer as a form of entertainment. Computer games run the gamut from simple alphabet games for toddlers to chess, treasure hunts, war games, and simulations of world events. The games are controlled from a keyboard or with a joystick or other device and are supplied on disks, on CD-ROMs, as game cartridges, on the Internet, or as arcade devices.
Games are activities involving structured playing, usually undertaken for enjoyment and sometimes used as an educational tool.
A pursuit or activity with rules performed either alone or with others, for the purpose of entertainment.
A contest with rules to determine a winner
A game is structured playing, usually undertaken for enjoyment and sometimes used as an educational tool.

bn:00025270n: Darts are missile weapons, designed to fly such that a sharp, often weighted point will strike first.
A pointed missile weapon, intended to be thrown by the hand; a short lance; a javelin; any sharp-pointed missile weapon, as an arrow.
A small narrow pointed missile that is thrown or shot

bn:03610756n: Shot which hits the centre of a target.
The bullseye, or bull's - eye, is the center of a target, and by extension the name given to any shot that hits the bullseye.
A shot which hits the centre of a target.

bn:00002179n: The goal intended to be attained (and which is believed to be attainable)
A group of key performance indicators (KPIs) that correspond to the functional areas or strategic initiatives of an organization.
The goal intended to be attained (and which is believed to be attainable).
The point intended to be hit, or object intended to be attained or affected.

bn:00025278n: A game in which small pointed missiles are thrown at a dartboard
Darts is a form of throwing game in which small missiles are thrown at a circular target fixed to a wall.
Darts is a circular target hung on a wall.

apple_vendor_description: The direct hit emoji on Apple devices is a dynamic visual representation of impact, featuring a bold, circular target with a sharp, impactful red crosshair precisely centered. Apple's signature glossy finish and subtle 3D depth give the target a tactile feel, suggesting accuracy and a successful outcome. This emoji is often used to signify a bullseye, a perfectly executed plan, or achieving a goal with pinpoint precision, conveying a sense of accomplishment and exactness.
